column5: the Office of Immigration and Procedure received AMINE MANSOUR
column6: a 23 year old Algerian man who had no passport.------He came to the Kingdom of Cambodia on 24.11-2019 at the Phnom Penh International Airport (*if no mistake
column7: then he should still have a valid visa) . He was referred to the Department of Investigation and Implementation of the Immigration Department for further procedures of the law.
